name: Space Tycoon (Wellwick)
description:
Controls

Right click and drag to orbit, left click to go to another star.

When you have established factories or farms in different solar systems, you can use the left and right buttons to move between your colonised systems. This also helps when setting up shipping.

Fullscreen recommended!

How To Play

You start off with one starbase, with one factory to build parts. Parts can build Factories, Food can build Farms, which are the only way to produce Workers who turn on automation for production. The more workers you have, the more stuff you will produce!

Fuel was originally planned to be used for freighters that have automatic shipping between star systems, but I made this for a game jam and somewhat ran out of time! Luxuries produce the most credits, so getting farms of them going is the best way to make a lot of credits!

Factories and Farms get quadratically harder to build, expect to see diminishing returns.
